info.title: Clock

clock.name: clock
clock.description: This Resource describes the properties associated with clock and time. Clock is a time information. The Property "datetime" is using RFC3339 datetime format (e. g: "2007-04-05T14:30Z") (Time+Date+Timezone) The Property "countdown" is the desired total seconds for countdown.

countdown.description: The desired total seconds for countdown.

datetime.description: Rhe date time using RFC3339 datetime format (e.g: 2007-04-05T14:30:00Z, 2007-04-05T14:30:00+09:00).
